Taylor St, MC 152, Chicago, IL 60607 Email: zlan@uic.edu Related Sites: Research Website About Zhiling Lan is Professor of Computer Science at the University of Illinois Chicago (UIC). She also has a joint appointment with Argonne National Laboratory. She was Professor of Computer Science at the Illinois Institute of Technology from 2002 to 2023. She leads the SPEAR team (Systems for Performance, Energy, and Resiliency), part of the UIC EVL Lab.
